message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
My turn.  This is more than fair to make up for your aggressive first offer.
Still willing to compromise, but need a bit more
Time is running out, and the money is shrinking.  Meet me in the middle?
Middle ground is a moving target, adjusting for inflation
This is ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair deal. Take it or leave it, but the pot shrinks after every round.
